JecsTools.BackstoryDef.title: Backstory Maker
JecsTools.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Typing at the computers during [PAWN_possessive] younger days, [PAWN_nameDef] helped out with creating amazing backstories. [PAWN_pronoun] made amazing mods and learned the basics of backstory creation. Unsurprisingly, this made [PAWN_objective] awesome as well.
